long_description: The Patagonia Active Boy Shorts bring a sassy low rise and technical fabric to your everyday wardrobe. Quick-drying, lightweight fabric offers easy care, high recycled content and superior moisture transfer. Seamless construction reduces chafing. Waistband lies flat and won't roll or bind, preventing irritation. Soft, stretchy leg openings promote freedom of movement. Breathable mini-rib crotch. The Patagonia Active Boy Shorts are formfitting. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia.
short_description: The Patagonia Active Boy Shorts bring a sassy low rise and technical fabric to your everyday wardrobe.
